name: Invoke-Obfuscation STDIN+ Launcher
description: Detects Obfuscated use of stdin to execute PowerShell
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*cmd.{0,5}(?:\/c|\/r).+powershell.+(?:\$\{?input\}?|noexit).+\"/`
